meanings.definition: Bouses (noun): plural form of bouse, meaning a drinking spree or binge.
meanings.sent1: After work, he went on a bouses with his friends to celebrate.
meanings.sent2: Last weekend, they had a wild bouses at the beach party.
meanings.sent3: During the bouses, they danced and laughed all night long.
meanings.sent4: The bouses was like a river flowing with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent5: The memory of that bouses stayed with them for years to come.

meanings.definition: Bouses (verb): third person singular present of bouse, meaning to drink heavily.
meanings.sent1: She bouses every Friday night at the local pub.
meanings.sent2: He bouses so much that he always feels sick the next day.

meanings.definition: Bouses (adjective): comparative form of bouse, meaning more drunk or intoxicated.
meanings.sent1: He stumbled out of the party, feeling bouses than ever before.
